title: Authors and Citation
text: Jen-Hsiang Ou. Author, maintainer. Po-Ya Wu. Author. Chen-Tuo Liao. Author, thesis advisor.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Ou J, Wu P, Liao C (2023). TSDFGS: Training Set Determination Genomic Selection. R package version 2.4.2, https://oumarkme.github.io/TSDFGS.
code: @Manual{,   title = {TSDFGS: Training Set Determination For Genomic Selection},   author = {Jen-Hsiang Ou and Po-Ya Wu and Chen-Tuo Liao},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 2.4.2},   url = {https://oumarkme.github.io/TSDFGS}, }

what: Training Set Determination For Genomic Selection
title: Training Set Determination For Genomic Selection
text: package provides two useful tools determining proper train genomic selection prediction training set. better predict genomic estimated breeding values (GEBV), training set optimized highly genomic correlated test set possible. Several criteria published previously, including: Prediction error variance (PEV; Akdemir et al., 2015) Generalized coefficient determination (CD; Laloë et al., 1993) research provides alternative criterion, r-score, Pearson’s correlation GEBVs phenotypic values test set. determine reasonable training set size optimal training set building prediction model criteria. functions provided package. information method, please check published article: Training set determination genomic selection (Ou et al., 2019)

title: Training Set Determination For Genomic Selection
text: development version TSDFGS can installed GitHub (recommend): may also install stable version CRAN, recent function may include. functions developed r version 4.3.1 tested version 4.1.1. However, recommend use package R version > 4.0. Rcpp RcppEigen used package. addition, core C++ scripts published GitHub want better performance. Old versions available GitHub. may download source file install locally.
code: # library(devtools) install_github("oumarkme/TSDFGS", dependencies = TRUE, force = TRUE) install.packages("TSDFGS")

title: Training Set Determination For Genomic Selection
text: r_score: available calculating r-score (). pev_score: Function calculating PEV score (). cd_score: Function Calculating CD score (). optTrain: Function determining optimal training set (). SSDFGS: Function determining reasonable training set size (). Note cd_score() pev_score() functions also available STPGA package Deniz Akdemir. Try package advanced usage. want install recent version r_score() function independently, may download rscore.cpp script GitHub repo install :

title: Training Set Determination For Genomic Selection
text: example data provided testing package. Zhao et al. (2011) published rice genome data research. raw dataset available Rice Diversity website. pre-arranged dataset available GitHub repository, may loaded R

title: Training Set Determination For Genomic Selection
text: Author, maintainer E-mail: jen-hsiang.ou@imbim.uu.se Department Medical Biochemistry Microbiology, Uppsala University, Uppsala, Sweden Author E-mail: Po-Ya.Wu@hhu.de Institute Quantitative Genetics Genomics Plants, Heinrich Heine University, Düsseldorf, Germany Author, thesis advisor E-mail: ctliao@ntu.edu.tw Department Agronomy, National Taiwan University, Taipei, Taiwan

title: Training Set Determination For Genomic Selection
text: make use TSDFGS package research, appreciate citation following papers: Ou, J.-H., Liao, C.-T. Training set determination genomic selection. Theoretical Applied Genetics 132, 2781–2792 (2019). https://doi.org/10.1007/s00122-019-03387-0 Wu, P.-Y., Ou, J.-H., Liao, C.-T. Sample size determination training set optimization genomic prediction. Theoretical Applied Genetics 136, 57 (2023). https://doi.org/10.1007/s00122-023-04254-9

text: function fitting logisti growth model

title: Fit logistic growth curve model — FGCM

title: Fit logistic growth curve model — FGCM
text: geno Genotype information saved dataframe. Columns represent variants (SNPs PCs). nt numerical vector training set sample size estimating logistic growth curve parameters n_iter Number simulation training set size. Automatically gave suitable number default. multi.threads Default: FALSE. Multi-thread function avalyble mac linux systems.

title: Sample size determination for genomic selection — SSDFGS
text: geno numeric data frame carried genotype information (column: PCs, row: sample) nt numeric vector carried training set sizes r-score simulation. n_iter Number iterations estimating parameters. multi.threads Default: False. TRUE, function use 75% threads computer 4 threads. Multi-thread computing avalible mac linux environments.

TSDFGS — TSDFGS
text: propose optimality criterion determine required training set, r-score, derived directly Pearson's correlation genomic estimated breeding values phenotypic values test set <doi:10.1007/s00122-019-03387-0>. package provides two main functions determine good training set size.

Simulate r-scores of each training set size — nt2r
text: geno numeric dataframe genotype, column represent sites (genotype coding 1, 0, -1) nt Numeric. Number training set size n_iter Times iteration. (default = 30) multi.threads Default: FALSE. Multi-thread function avalyble mac linux systems.

text: vector r-scores iteration

Optimal training set determination — optTrain
text: function designed determining optimal training set.

title: Optimal training set determination — optTrain
code: optTrain(   geno,   cand,   n.train,   subpop = NULL,   test = NULL,   method = "rScore",   min.iter = NULL,   console = TRUE )

title: Optimal training set determination — optTrain
text: geno numeric matrix principal components (rows: individuals; columns: PCs). cand integer vector rows individuals candidates training set geno matrix. n.train size target training set. determined help ssdfgp function provided package. subpop character vector sub-population's group name. algorithm ignore population structure remains NULL. test integer vector rows individuals test set geno matrix. algorithm use un-target method remains NULL. method Choices rScore, PEV CD. rScore used default. min.iter Minimum iteration methods can appointed. One always check algorithm converged . minimum iteration set considering candidate test set size remains NULL. console Default: TRUE. Set FALSE want function printing number count iteration.

title: Optimal training set determination — optTrain
text: function return 3 information including OPTtrain (vector chosen optimal training set), TOPscore (highest scores iteration), ITERscore (criteria scores iteration).
